name: Tunic, Black and Red
description: The basic black tunic is a very versatile garment that can be worn with just about any costume, and it can be worn by Men or Women. The neckline of this tunic, sleeves and bottom of the garment are trimmed with a contrasting colored trim. The Tunic is made from textured cotton and is very comfortable to wear....

name: Tunic, Beige and Brown
description: The basic Beige Tunic is an unisex garment ideal for any Larp firghter or viking, Fantasy fair or Cosplay event. Made of comfortable cotton, it's a great, affordable start for your larp costume.

name: Elven Tunic, Black
description: Our Elven Tunic is a medieval looking costume with a fantasy twist perfect for LARP and Cosplay events. This cotton tunic is fitted, comfortable and ideal for your character.

name: Elven Tunic, Green
description: Our Elven Tunic is a medieval looking costume with a fantasy twist perfect for LARP and Cosplay events. This cotton tunic is fitted, comfortable and ideal for your character.

name: Roman Tunic, Red
description: Our Roman Tunic is a beautifully trimmed tunic for re-enactment or LARP. Its authentic roman feel will give an edge to your character with its embroidery and faux-linen feel.

name: Roman Tunic, Black
description: This black roman tunic with typical authentic shape with a A-line waist that looks better when worn with a waist belt. Broidery on the sleeves of this tunic have gold and black jacquard trim with the fabric slightly folded in the hem. Our Roman Tunic is made of a light to medium weight cotton with a simulated linen look.

name: Tunic, Brown and Black
description: The basic brown tunic is a very versatile garment that can be worn with just about any costume, and it can be worn by Men or Women. The neckline of this tunic, sleeves and bottom of the garment are trimmed with a contrasting colored trim. The Tunic is made from textured cotton and is very comfortable to wear....

name: Sam Tunic, Red and Black
description: The red and black Sam Tunic comes in a variety of sizes and is part of our basic clothing collection. A tunic is a versatile article of clothing that can fit almost any style that can work alone or as a base layer. Simple and sturdy, this larp tunic is a great way to dress your larp character.

name: Sam Tunic, Green and Blue
description: Whether you are a warrior or a peasant the tunic is an essential piece of Larp clothing for any character. The Green and black Sam Tunic is a simple cotton tunic that can be worn by itself or layered to create a more complicated Larp costume.
